article_title: How States Can Unwind Obamacare Expansion And Restore The Working Class

article_metadata.author: The Apothecary

og.description: One idea rapidly gaining currency among legislators and new governors’ transition teams is the possibility of renewing Medicaid expansion on a temporary basis for those who have already signed up, but immediately freezing enrollment going forward.
og.title: Welfare To Work: How States Can Unwind Obamacare Expansion And Restore The Working Class
